titleStmt.title: A warning to the inhabitants of England, and London in particular for so it rise often in my heart to write, even a warning that the inhabitants might hear and fear the judgments of the Lord, that are ready to fall upon this nation speedily, unless they repent of the evil of their doings, and return from their iniquities, that God may yet shew mercy upon this poor nation. By M.A.
titleStmt.author: Adams, Mary, fl. 1652-1676.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Earlham College, Richmond, Indiana, Library.
